merpi_desc: %USER's muzzle. Short or long, it sure is a face of all time. Maybe you should...?

merpi_flowery: %USER pulls their head back for a moment before slamming their muzzle into %TARGET's %T_PART violently!!
%USER presses their muzzle close to %TARGET's %T_PART, nuzzling and showing desire.
%USER presses their muzzle in close to %TARGET's %T_PART, warmly and lovingly pressing it to themselves.

merpi_normal: %USER pushes their muzzle to %TARGET's %T_PART, letting them feel how heated it is.
merpi_flowery: %USER rubs their muzzle against %TARGET's %T_PART, the clear warmth radiating from it should make it clear that they're either in heat, or deeply desire %TARGET!
%USER rubs lovingly against %TARGET's %T_PART with their muzzle, obviously showing them deep amounts of love and affection.
%USER very gently headbutts %TARGET's %T_PART, it's a playful motion but also more than a bit needy as they don't pull away after connecting while seeming a bit flushed!
%USER holds their muzzle still against %TARGET's %T_PART, savoring the moment between the two in full.
merpi_repeat: %USER pushes their muzzle to %TARGET's %T_PART with love!

merpi_normal: %USER smushes %TARGET's %T_PART to their muzzle a bit too hard!
merpi_flowery: %USER seems to lose control of their senses a bit, warmth radiating from their muzzle as it gets near %TARGET's %T_PART!
%USER rests their muzzle so gently on %TARGET's %T_PART that it seems they don't even want to move, reveling in the closeness of the other person.
